projects.title: Multivariate Crime Prediction in London Using Spatio-Temporal Graph Neural Network (STGNN-ZINB)
projects.description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) model which can learn both spatial and temporal crime patterns and predict multiple crimes simultaneously. Implementing a Zero-Inflated Negative Binomial (ZINB) loss to control zero-inflated issues.

projects.title: Data Jobs Power BI Dashboards
projects.description: Transforming real-world job posting data into interactive dashboards using Power BI Desktop. Provides clear insights into job titles, salaries, locations, and in-demand skills.

projects.title: Predicting Autism Spectrum Disorder with Machine Learning & Models Comparison
projects.description: AI-based predictive model that improves the early and accurate diagnosis of Autism Spectrum Disorder. Analyze & select most efficient and high-accuracy Model.

projects.title: Data Visualization & Analysis of Crime Patterns in Colchester, Essex, UK (2024-2025) using R
projects.description: Visualises crime incidents in Colchester, UK during 2024-2025 and analyses their potential relationship with climates and environmental factors.

projects.title: AI Powered Image Editing Web Application
projects.description: An intelligent image editing platform that allows users to restore images, remove objects, recolor objects, generative fill, and remove backgrounds. This projects consists of APIs analysis and testing performance via postman and the best free APIs are implemented.

projects.title: Live Chat Room Application
projects.description: Designed a real-time application focusing on streaming data ingestion and storage with Firebase Authentication and Database.

projects.title: Receipe Web Application
projects.description: A responsive and user-friendly recipe web app that allows users and chefs to Register or log in, Add or edit recipes. It also enables users to: Search and filter recipes, Save favorites, Rate recipes for a personalized cooking experience
